014    package net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation;
015    
016    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
017    
018    import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
019    import java.lang.reflect.Field;
020    import java.lang.reflect.Method;
021    import java.util.Collection;
022    import java.util.List;
023    
024    import javax.validation.Valid;
025    import javax.validation.constraints.AssertFalse;
026    import javax.validation.constraints.AssertTrue;
027    import javax.validation.constraints.DecimalMax;
028    import javax.validation.constraints.DecimalMin;
029    import javax.validation.constraints.Digits;
030    import javax.validation.constraints.Future;
031    import javax.validation.constraints.Max;
032    import javax.validation.constraints.Min;
033    import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
034    import javax.validation.constraints.Null;
035    import javax.validation.constraints.Past;
036    import javax.validation.constraints.Pattern;
037    import javax.validation.constraints.Size;
038    import javax.validation.constraints.Pattern.Flag;
039    
040    import net.sf.oval.Check;
041    import net.sf.oval.configuration.Configurer;
042    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.ClassConfiguration;
043    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.ConstraintSetConfiguration;
044    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.FieldConfiguration;
045    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.MethodConfiguration;
046    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.MethodReturnValueConfiguration;
047    import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertFalseCheck;
048    import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertNullCheck;
049    import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertTrueCheck;
050    import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck;
051    import net.sf.oval.constraint.DigitsCheck;
052    import net.sf.oval.constraint.FutureCheck;
053    import net.sf.oval.constraint.MatchPatternCheck;
054    import net.sf.oval.constraint.MaxCheck;
055    import net.sf.oval.constraint.MinCheck;
056    import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck;
057    import net.sf.oval.constraint.PastCheck;
058    import net.sf.oval.constraint.SizeCheck;
059    import net.sf.oval.internal.Log;
060    import net.sf.oval.internal.util.ReflectionUtils;
061    
062    /**
063     * Constraints configurer that interprets the JSR303 built-in Java Bean Validation annotations:
064     * <ul>
065     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.AssertFalse    => net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertFalseCheck
066     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.AssertTrue     => net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertTrueCheck
067     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.DecimalMax     => net.sf.oval.constraint.MaxCheck
068     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.DecimalMin     => net.sf.oval.constraint.MinCheck
069     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.Digits         => net.sf.oval.constraint.DigitsCheck
070     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.Future         => net.sf.oval.constraint.FutureCheck
071     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.Max            => net.sf.oval.constraint.MaxCheck
072     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.Min            => net.sf.oval.constraint.MinCheck
073     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.NotNull        => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck
074     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.Null           => net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertNullCheck
075     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.Past           => net.sf.oval.constraint.PastCheck
076     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.Pattern        => net.sf.oval.constraint.PatternCheck
077     * <li>javax.validation.constraints.Size           => net.sf.oval.constraint.SizeCheck
078     * <li>javax.validation.Valid                      => net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck
079     * </ul>
080     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
081     */
082    public class BeanValidationAnnotationsConfigurer implements Configurer
083    {
084            private static final Log LOG = Log.getLog(BeanValidationAnnotationsConfigurer.class);
085    
086            protected Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
087            protected Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
088    
089            /**
090             * @return the applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors
091             */
092            public Boolean getApplyFieldConstraintsToConstructors()
093            {
094                    return applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
095            }
096    
097            /**
098             * {@inheritDoc}
099             */
100            public ClassConfiguration getClassConfiguration(final Class< ? > clazz)
101            {
102                    final ClassConfiguration config = new ClassConfiguration();
103                    config.type = clazz;
104                    config.applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors = applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
105                    config.applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
106    
107                    /*
108                     * determine field checks
109                     */
110                    for (final Field field : config.type.getDeclaredFields())
111                    {
112                            final List<Check> checks = getCollectionFactory().createList(4);
113    
114                            // loop over all annotations of the current field
115                            for (final Annotation annotation : field.getAnnotations())
116                                    initializeChecks(annotation, checks);
117    
118                            if (checks.size() > 0)
119                            {
120                                    if (config.fieldConfigurations == null)
121                                            config.fieldConfigurations = getCollectionFactory().createSet(8);
122    
123                                    final FieldConfiguration fc = new FieldConfiguration();
124                                    fc.name = field.getName();
125                                    fc.checks = checks;
126                                    config.fieldConfigurations.add(fc);
127                            }
128                    }
129    
130                    /*
131                     * determine getter checks
132                     */
133                    for (final Method method : config.type.getDeclaredMethods())
134                    {
135                            // consider getters only 
136                            if (!ReflectionUtils.isGetter(method)) continue;
137    
138                            final List<Check> checks = getCollectionFactory().createList(2);
139    
140                            // loop over all annotations
141                            for (final Annotation annotation : method.getAnnotations())
142                                    initializeChecks(annotation, checks);
143    
144                            // check if anything has been configured for this method at all
145                            if (checks.size() > 0)
146                            {
147                                    if (config.methodConfigurations == null)
148                                            config.methodConfigurations = getCollectionFactory().createSet(2);
149    
150                                    final MethodConfiguration mc = new MethodConfiguration();
151                                    mc.name = method.getName();
152                                    mc.isInvariant = true;
153                                    if (checks.size() > 0)
154                                    {
155                                            mc.returnValueConfiguration = new MethodReturnValueConfiguration();
156                                            mc.returnValueConfiguration.checks = checks;
157                                    }
158                                    config.methodConfigurations.add(mc);
159                            }
160                    }
161                    return config;
162            }
163    
164            /**
165             * {@inheritDoc}
166             */
167            public ConstraintSetConfiguration getConstraintSetConfiguration(final String constraintSetId)
168            {
169                    return null;
170            }
171    
172            protected void initializeChecks(final Annotation annotation, final Collection<Check> checks)
173            {
174                    assert annotation != null;
175                    assert checks != null;
176    
177                    Class< ? >[] groups = null;
178                    Check check = null;
179                    if (annotation instanceof NotNull)
180                    {
181                            groups = ((NotNull) annotation).groups();
182                            check = new NotNullCheck();
183                    }
184                    else if (annotation instanceof Null)
185                    {
186                            groups = ((Null) annotation).groups();
187                            check = new AssertNullCheck();
188                    }
189                    else if (annotation instanceof Valid)
190                            check = new AssertValidCheck();
191                    else if (annotation instanceof AssertTrue)
192                    {
193                            groups = ((AssertTrue) annotation).groups();
194                            check = new AssertTrueCheck();
195                    }
196                    else if (annotation instanceof AssertFalse)
197                    {
198                            groups = ((AssertFalse) annotation).groups();
199                            check = new AssertFalseCheck();
200                    }
201                    else if (annotation instanceof DecimalMax)
202                    {
203                            groups = ((DecimalMax) annotation).groups();
204                            final MaxCheck maxCheck = new MaxCheck();
205                            maxCheck.setMax(Double.parseDouble(((DecimalMax) annotation).value()));
206                            check = maxCheck;
207                    }
208                    else if (annotation instanceof DecimalMin)
209                    {
210                            groups = ((DecimalMin) annotation).groups();
211                            final MinCheck minCheck = new MinCheck();
212                            minCheck.setMin(Double.parseDouble(((DecimalMin) annotation).value()));
213                            check = minCheck;
214                    }
215                    else if (annotation instanceof Max)
216                    {
217                            groups = ((Max) annotation).groups();
218                            final MaxCheck maxCheck = new MaxCheck();
219                            maxCheck.setMax(((Max) annotation).value());
220                            check = maxCheck;
221                    }
222                    else if (annotation instanceof Min)
223                    {
224                            groups = ((Min) annotation).groups();
225                            final MinCheck minCheck = new MinCheck();
226                            minCheck.setMin(((Min) annotation).value());
227                            check = minCheck;
228                    }
229                    else if (annotation instanceof Future)
230                    {
231                            groups = ((Future) annotation).groups();
232                            check = new FutureCheck();
233                    }
234                    else if (annotation instanceof Past)
235                    {
236                            groups = ((Past) annotation).groups();
237                            check = new PastCheck();
238                    }
239                    else if (annotation instanceof Pattern)
240                    {
241                            groups = ((Pattern) annotation).groups();
242                            final MatchPatternCheck matchPatternCheck = new MatchPatternCheck();
243                            int iflag = 0;
244                            for (final Flag flag : ((Pattern) annotation).flags())
245                                    iflag = iflag | flag.getValue();
246                            matchPatternCheck.setPattern(((Pattern) annotation).regexp(), iflag);
247                            check = matchPatternCheck;
248                    }
249                    else if (annotation instanceof Digits)
250                    {
251                            groups = ((Digits) annotation).groups();
252                            final DigitsCheck digitsCheck = new DigitsCheck();
253                            digitsCheck.setMaxFraction(((Digits) annotation).fraction());
254                            digitsCheck.setMaxInteger(((Digits) annotation).integer());
255                            check = digitsCheck;
256                    }
257                    else if (annotation instanceof Size)
258                    {
259                            groups = ((Size) annotation).groups();
260                            final SizeCheck sizeCheck = new SizeCheck();
261                            sizeCheck.setMax(((Size) annotation).max());
262                            sizeCheck.setMin(((Size) annotation).min());
263                            check = sizeCheck;
264                    }
265                    else
266                    {
267                            LOG.warn("Ignoring unsupported JSR303 constraint annotation {1}", annotation);
268                            return;
269                    }
270    
271                    if (check != null)
272                    {
273                            if (groups != null && groups.length > 0)
274                            {
275                                    final String[] profiles = new String[groups.length];
276                                    for (int i = 0, l = groups.length; i < l; i++)
277                                            profiles[i] = groups.getClass().getName();
278                                    check.setProfiles(profiles);
279                            }
280                            checks.add(check);
281                            return;
282                    }
283    
284                    Annotation[] list = null;
285                    if (annotation instanceof AssertFalse.List)
286                            list = ((AssertFalse.List) annotation).value();
287                    else if (annotation instanceof AssertTrue.List)
288                            list = ((AssertTrue.List) annotation).value();
289                    else if (annotation instanceof DecimalMax.List)
290                            list = ((DecimalMax.List) annotation).value();
291                    else if (annotation instanceof DecimalMin.List)
292                            list = ((DecimalMin.List) annotation).value();
293                    else if (annotation instanceof Digits.List)
294                            list = ((Digits.List) annotation).value();
295                    else if (annotation instanceof Future.List)
296                            list = ((Future.List) annotation).value();
297                    else if (annotation instanceof Max.List)
298                            list = ((Max.List) annotation).value();
299                    else if (annotation instanceof Min.List)
300                            list = ((Min.List) annotation).value();
301                    else if (annotation instanceof NotNull.List)
302                            list = ((NotNull.List) annotation).value();
303                    else if (annotation instanceof Null.List)
304                            list = ((Null.List) annotation).value();
305                    else if (annotation instanceof Past.List)
306                            list = ((Past.List) annotation).value();
307                    else if (annotation instanceof Pattern.List)
308                            list = ((Pattern.List) annotation).value();
309                    else if (annotation instanceof Size.List) list = ((Size.List) annotation).value();
310    
311                    if (list != null) for (final Annotation anno : list)
312                            initializeChecks(anno, checks);
313            }
314    
315            /**
316             * @return the applyFieldConstraintsToSetter
317             */
318            public Boolean isApplyFieldConstraintsToSetter()
319            {
320                    return applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
321            }
322    
323            /**
324             * @param applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors the applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors to set
325             */
326            public void setApplyFieldConstraintsToConstructors(final Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors)
327            {
328                    this.applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors = applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
329            }
330    
331            /**
332             * @param applyFieldConstraintsToSetters the applyFieldConstraintsToSetter to set
333             */
334            public void setApplyFieldConstraintsToSetters(final Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters)
335            {
336                    this.applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
337            }
338    
339    }
